message: I blame myself in part; I let the energy climb all rather high, didn‚Äôt I.

author: Kai
message: I don‚Äôt care much for whatever your previous pattern is, or how scathingly you judge it. If your mind can be like mine, which I can hear it is, when it sets against us it will do its damndest to prove to us we are good for no one, really.

author: Kai
message: No one can can force you to do anything tomorrow. But neither of us have essentially anything to lose. I had a shitty 2 days too. Who knows Poppy; you might surprise yourself. Maybe we‚Äôd even have fun for a couple hours. We‚Äôre just friends...

message: My behaviours are not fair on any man that is trying to come into my life and it‚Äôs totally unfair, I hate that I do this. I truly am sorry Rick.

message: No, you did not cause it.

author: Kai
message: I‚Äôve already told you I expected at least one storm ahead of time.

author: Kai
message: I‚Äôve also told you that, with all due respect, its a storm in a tea cup.

author: Kai
message: So go ahead, have your storm. Its part of your MO to not let me actually help you, but rather just send a load of broken record stuff about it not being fair on me, yadda yadda.

author: Kai
message: Do me a favour please and stop telling me what does and doesn‚Äôt mess me around.

author: Kai
message: I hate to break it to you, but maybe all these fears you experience are not actually that important. They come, they will go.

author: Kai
message: You‚Äôre under no pressure to do anything. It was just a cup of coffee.

author: Kai
message: Anyway look I‚Äôm off to the gym. Don‚Äôt worry about it. Do I think it serves you to quit in the long term? I don‚Äôt. But its easier said than done.

author: Kai
message: Just go look after yourself, ok. Have a bath or something. x
